DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I . Evaluate beneficial effect leuprolide depot , oral contraceptive therapy , leuprolide/oral contraceptive therapy management patient ovarian hyperandrogenism .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Randomized Study Leuprolide Vs Oral Contraceptive Therapy Vs Leuprolide Oral Contraceptive Therapy Ovarian Hyperandrogenism
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : This randomize study . Patients randomly assign 6-month course leuprolide versus ethinyl estradiol/norethindrone ( Ovcon 35 ) versus leuprolide plus Ovcon 35 . Leuprolide administer intramuscularly depot form every 28 day .
DOC.mesh_term: Norethindrone acetate , ethinyl estradiol , ferrous fumarate drug combination
DOC.criteria: PROTOCOL ENTRY CRITERIA : Disease Characteristics Ovarian hyperandrogenism Lorenzo hirsutism score 7 20 , without severe acne Serum hormone level : Folliclestimulating hormone great 40 mIU/mL Luteinizing hormone great 40 mIU/mL Testosterone 60 200 ng/dL Dehydroepiandrosterone sulfate great 430 micrograms/dL 17hydroxyprogesterone great 3.3 ng/mL follicular phase Prolactin great 18 ng/dL No adrenal ovarian tumor Prior/Concurrent Therapy At least 6 month since exogenous steroid At least 48 hour since drug acetaminophen , ibuprofen , aspirin Patient Characteristics No malignancy , include follow carcinoma : Breast Cervix Ovary Uterus No serious illness No cigarette smokers No nursing woman No pregnancy within 6 month prior entry
